Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-18, see notes under ยง 5-1501.01.

DC CODE ยง 5-1501.05

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: (1) In addition to a Director, the Department shall have a Deputy Director, and other professional and support personnel as necessary and appropriate to carry out the agency's mission.
The Deputy Director shall have a masters or doctoral degree in an applicable area of science or forensic analysis and a minimum of 2 years experience in forensic sciences.

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)
